textContent:
A class has a wide array of abilities that can be learnt. This is handled through the Ability Pyramid, Ability Slot, Ability Tier and Discovery System.
Each class has a single Ability Pyramid. It divides the set of the class' abilities into multiple Ability Tiers, and holds a varying number of Ability Slots for each Tier (decreasing the higher the Tier is). 
Slots are sockets where players can insert an ability out of a list. The list includes all of the player's "discovered" abilities for that specific Class and of the given Tier (or a lower Tier).
The Discovery System determines which abilities are available to a player, while not necessarily known. Abilities are discovered through various means.

Each class has 5 Tiers.
Each Tier of abilities displays how many you have discovered out of the maximum of that tier.

Every 2 Tiers, in order to progress to the next Tier of abilities, all classes must complete an specific event/encounter (otherwise, they can't invest points into the next Tiers). 
[[This leaves us with 18 encounters that need to be designed]]
